name: distbench

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Distbench is a tool for synthesizing a variety of network traffic
patterns used in distributed systems, and evaluating their performance
across multiple networking stacks.

dependencies.name: bazel
dependencies.description:
Bazel is an open-source build and test tool similar to Make, Maven, and
Gradle. It uses a human-readable, high-level build language. Bazel
supports projects in multiple languages and builds outputs for multiple
platforms. Bazel supports large codebases across multiple repositories,
and large numbers of users.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
